caption: Databucket
description: The databucket object is a basic container that holds data, typically organized through the use of data partitions.
name: databucket

cloud_partition.description: The logical grouping or isolated segment within a cloud provider's infrastructure where the databucket is located.

created_time.description: The time when the databucket was known to have been created.

criticality.description: The criticality of the databucket as defined by the event source.

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the databucket. Should be populated if the databucket is encrypted.

file.description: Details about the file/object within a databucket.

group.description: The name of the related resource group.

groups.description: The group names to which the databucket belongs.

hostname.description: The fully qualified hostname of the databucket.

ip.description: The IP address of the resource, in either IPv4 or IPv6 format.

is_encrypted.description: Indicates if the databucket is encrypted.

is_public.description: Indicates if the databucket is publicly accessible.

modified_time.description: The most recent time when any changes, updates, or modifications were made within the databucket.

namespace.description: The namespace is useful when similar entities exist that you need to keep separate.

owner.description: The identity of the service or user account that owns the databucket.

region.description: The cloud region of the databucket.

resource_relationship.description: A graph representation showing how this databucket relates to and interacts with other entities in the environment. This can include parent/child relationships, dependencies, or other connections.

size.description: The size of the databucket in bytes.

type_id.description: The normalized identifier of the databucket type.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the databucket.

version.description: The version of the resource. For example 1.2.3.

zone.caption: Cloud Availability Zone
zone.description: The specific availability zone within a cloud region where the databucket is located.
